WELCOME to UIS Online! Thanks to the Internet, you can pick up an extra course during the term without traveling to campus. You can take a couple of summer classes no matter where you spend your break, or even earn your entire degree online. The University of Illinois at Springfield Online offers a range of courses, programs, and services so you can feel a part of the University no matter where you are. http://online.uis.edu/
